snippet: Several late-night TV hosts have recently been in the news, including Conan O’Brien, who signed a contract extension with TBS through November 2015, and Jimmy Fallon, whose succession of Jay Leno on “The Tonight Show” was announced last week.
lead_paragraph: Several late-night TV hosts have recently been in the news, including Conan O’Brien, who signed a contract extension with TBS through November 2015, and Jimmy Fallon, whose succession of Jay Leno on “The Tonight Show” was announced last week.
